text: Hilton Thon Mauro Moreira, a.k.a. Thon MoreiraHilton Moreira on Soccerway or Thon Thomas (born February 27, 1981 in Pindamonhangaba, São Paulo) is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a forward.Hilton Moreira on velozindosports On May 2013, Sriwijaya and Persib Bandung agreed to exchange players. Dzumafo (to Sriwijaya) and Hilton (to Persib) eventually exchanged. In December 2013, Hilton made a shock move to a M-League 2 team, Penang FA after impress in a pre-season match against Kelantan FA where the team won 2–0. ==Honours== ;Sriwijaya *Indonesia Super League: 2011–12 == References == ==External links== * Hilton Mauro Moreira at Liga-Indonesia.co.id * Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Badak Lampung F.C. players Category:1981 births Category:People from Pindamonhangaba Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Liga 2 (Indonesia) players Category:Sriwijaya FC players Category:Deltras F.C. players Category:Persipura Jayapura players Category:Persib Bandung players Category:Mixto Esporte Clube players Category:Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras players Category:Expatriate footballers in Indonesia Category:Brazilian expatriates in Indonesia Category:Penang FA players Category:Expatriate footballers in Malaysia Category:Brazilian expatriates in Malaysia Category:Association football forwards Category:Association football wingers Category:Living people
